mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PIN ( PIN_NO , JOIN_DATE) VALUES ( 'UP'||TO_CHAR(USERPINSEQ.NEXTVAL) , SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PIN_NO AS PINNO FROM (SELECT PIN_NO FROM USER_PIN ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_NO , PIN_NO , ID , PW , NICKNAME ) VALUES ( 'US'||TO_CHAR(USERNOSEQ.NEXTVAL) ,(SELECT PIN_NO FROM (SELECT PIN_NO FROM USER_PIN ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) ,#{userId} ,#{userPw} ,#{nickname})
